name.description: A brief name for the compromise event.

desc.description: A prose description of the compromise event.

campaign.description: The campaign that this compromise is part of.

loss:pii.description: The number of records compromised which contain PII.

loss:econ.description: The total economic cost of the compromise.

loss:life.description: The total loss of life due to the compromise.

loss:bytes.description: An estimate of the volume of data compromised.

ransom:paid.description: The value of the ransom paid by the target.

ransom:price.description: The value of the ransom demanded by the attacker.

response:cost.description: The economic cost of the response and mitigation efforts.

theft:price.description: The total value of the theft of assets.

econ:currency.description: The currency type for the econ:price fields.
